description: Gets a set of statistics for queues or farms. Before you can call the GetSessionStatisticsAggregation operation, you must first call the StartSessionsStatisticsAggregation operation. Statistics are available for 1 hour after you call the StartSessionsStatisticsAggregation operation.

parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The identifier of the farm to include in the statistics. This should be the same as the farm ID used in the call to the StartSessionsStatisticsAggregation operation.

parameters.name: aggregationId
parameters.description: The identifier returned by the StartSessionsStatisticsAggregation operation that identifies the aggregated statistics.

nested_items.name: statistics
nested_items.description: The statistics for the specified fleets or queues.

nested_items.name: queueId
nested_items.description: The queue ID.

nested_items.name: fleetId
nested_items.description: The fleet ID.

nested_items.name: jobId
nested_items.description: The job ID.

nested_items.name: jobName
nested_items.description: The job name.

nested_items.name: userId
nested_items.description: The user ID.

nested_items.name: usageType
nested_items.description: The type of usage for the statistics.

nested_items.name: licenseProduct
nested_items.description: The licensed product.

nested_items.name: instanceType
nested_items.description: The type of instance.

nested_items.name: count
nested_items.description: The number of instances in a list of statistics.

nested_items.name: costInUsd
nested_items.description: How the statistics should appear in USD. Options include: minimum, maximum, average or sum.

nested_items.name: min
nested_items.description: The minimum of the usage statistics.

nested_items.name: max
nested_items.description: The maximum among the usage statistics.

nested_items.name: avg
nested_items.description: The average of the usage statistics.

nested_items.name: sum
nested_items.description: The sum of the usage statistics.

nested_items.name: runtimeInSeconds
nested_items.description: The total aggregated runtime.

nested_items.name: min
nested_items.description: The minimum of the usage statistics.

nested_items.name: max
nested_items.description: The maximum among the usage statistics.

nested_items.name: avg
nested_items.description: The average of the usage statistics.

nested_items.name: sum
nested_items.description: The sum of the usage statistics.

nested_items.name: aggregationStartTime
nested_items.description: The start time for the aggregation.

nested_items.name: aggregationEndTime
nested_items.description: The end time for the aggregation.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If Deadline Cloud returns nextToken, then there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. To retrieve the next page, call the operation again using the returned token. Keep all other arguments unchanged. If no results remain, then nextToken is set to null. Each pagination token expires after 24 hours. If you provide a token that isn't valid, then you receive an HTTP 400 ValidationException error.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the aggregated results. An aggregation may fail or time out if the results are too large. If this happens, you can call the StartSessionsStatisticsAggregation operation after you reduce the aggregation time frame, reduce the number of queues or fleets in the aggregation, or increase the period length.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A message that describes the status.
